Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Tupakito> yo, what could be the usecases for Hush? is it possible to build apps on top of Hush (or zcash/kmd and link to Hush)?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I am not understanding the question

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Tupakito> I mean today how can we create a friendly use case for Hush ? like an app to send encrypted message or something

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> that is what we work on every day in #developers

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> What I could really use from the community, is to find a business or organization that will accept Hush as currency, to buy or donate

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Hush is money, at it's basic level. We need to increase it's adoption for it's most basic use case

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and I think a biz that values privacy for themselves and their customers, can see the value in supporting Hush. We need to find that first company, then others will come more easily

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> I agree. This is what I said earlier.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> I showed them how I emailed pornhub, Mullvad, Haven marketplace, TOR, QubesOS.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> Trying for one, for starters, we just need one to get it rolling.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> The change machine above, could be used at a business, on the front counter.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> Like a HushATM for spare change

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Who needs privacy most? And who has the means to pay for it?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> At the intersection of those, are people who want to use Hush, but don't know it yet

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> Businesses.

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> What happens when the exchange removes us a few months later, or wants to charge you $1000 per version update?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> when you pay $50K to play somebody elses game, you have already lost

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> TradeSatoshi? Crex24? TradeOgre?
Maybe one is free

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> They are using our open source code to generate fees from, it's insane

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> AltsBit is just the rebranding of digitalprice, fyi, and i don't trust they know what they are doing. Hush is not in the game of paying for listings anymore

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> paying for listings is a scam

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> a small integration fee, sure. But any type of large listing fee is a no-go

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> It's the beginning of an abusive relationship

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> I get your point

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <gilardh> me too

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Hush core wants nothing to do with begging our community to pay shady exchanges to list us

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> That is a scam.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Captain> anyhow, I have asked a mate of mine who has some big connections. Let's see where it ends.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Like I said, getting an existing biz to accept Hush as payment is the NUMBER ONE MOST IMPORTANT THING we can do

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> average people don't use exchanges

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> üëç

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @Captain exchanges don't really care about connections, they want to make money

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> I'm on board with trying to get a business interested to use Hush.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and their entire biz plan will go away in a few years, via laws and competent competitors

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> so we are in a "fools rush in" time of this industry

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> `Use cases precede value`

Author: Gateway#3763
